name: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition (Demo Version)
name_original: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition (Demo Version)
description:
Check the web build here! https://hannorsmith.itch.io/tbhk-gb-demo-web

The Demo version of Gameboy fangame for Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun (A.K.A. Jibaku Shounen Hanako-Kun) manga/anime.

If you found bugs, problems or suggestions, DM me at @HanakoKun_GB in Twitter, or send me an e-mail at hanakokungameboy@gmail.com

This game is built for Gameboy, so if you want to played it on PC, Android or other devices. You need a Gameboy Emulator to play this game.

Original manga/anime by Aidairo 

Game by Hannor Smith
